argumentText:
ARGUMENT
s w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islinds.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | #P_elex | |- ( W e. V -> W e. _V ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( Base ` w ) = ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_pweqd | |- ( w = W -> ~P ( Base ` w ) = ~P ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_breq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( ( _I |` s ) LIndF w <-> ( _I |` s ) LIndF W ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( w = W -> { s e. ~P ( Base ` w ) | ( _I |` s ) LIndF w } = { s e. ~P ( Base ` W ) | ( _I |` s ) LIndF W } ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-linds | |- LIndS = ( w e. _V |-> { s e. ~P ( Base ` w ) | ( _I |` s ) LIndF w } ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 9 | 8 | #P_pwex | |- ~P ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 10 | 9 | #P_rabex | |- { s e. ~P ( Base ` W ) | ( _I |` s ) LIndF W } e. _V |
| 11 | 6, 7, 10 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( W e. _V -> ( LIndS ` W ) = { s e. ~P ( Base ` W ) | ( _I |` s ) LIndF W } ) |
| 12 | 2, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. V -> ( LIndS ` W ) = { s e. ~P ( Base ` W ) | ( _I |` s ) LIndF W } ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( W e. V -> ( X e. ( LIndS ` W ) <-> X e. { s e. ~P ( Base ` W ) | ( _I |` s ) LIndF W } ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_reseq2 | |- ( s = X -> ( _I |` s ) = ( _I |` X ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_breq1d | |- ( s = X -> ( ( _I |` s ) LIndF W <-> ( _I |` X ) LIndF W ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_elrab | |- ( X e. { s e. ~P ( Base ` W ) | ( _I |` s ) LIndF W } <-> ( X e. ~P ( Base ` W ) /\ ( _I |` X ) LIndF W ) ) |
| 17 | 13, 16 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( W e. V -> ( X e. ( LIndS ` W ) <-> ( X e. ~P ( Base ` W ) /\ ( _I |` X ) LIndF W ) ) ) |
| 18 | 8 | #P_elpw2 | |- ( X e. ~P ( Base ` W ) <-> X C_ ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 19 | 1 | #P_sseq2i | |- ( X C_ B <-> X C_ ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( X e. ~P ( Base ` W ) <-> X C_ B ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( X e. ~P ( Base ` W ) /\ ( _I |` X ) LIndF W ) <-> ( X C_ B /\ ( _I |` X ) LIndF W ) ) |
| 22 | 17, 21 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( W e. V -> ( X e. ( LIndS ` W ) <-> ( X C_ B /\ ( _I |` X ) LIndF W ) ) ) |
